name: YOLO (DocGeraud)
description:
Drink and smoke to forget your sadness (and SCORE). But don't over do it!

warning : flashing lights and colors, heavy screen distorsion, alcohol and cigarettes

  • Press left click to smoke
  • Press right click to drink

A game made in 6 hours for the Trijam 98. The theme was "too much of a good thing is bad". Well, some could argue that I kinda did "too much of a bad thing is bad", but it is what it is!

Made by Géraud Zucchini

Music by Antoine Druaux
